Web基础

DAY01

html---->css--->javascript---->jQuery----->ajax----->bootstrap

1.是什么

2.该怎么使用

3.有什么作用

一、网页开发基础知识

网页文件是使用html进行书写

产生一个网页文件，文本文档，Hbuilder，DreamWeaver,eclipse

网页主要由三个部分组成：结构，表现，行为

​ 结构：网页的结构和内容【一个网页包括标题，正文段落或者列表】-----》html

​ 表现：设定网页的样式【字号，字体，颜色等】--------》css

​ 行为：控制网页的行为【网页可以变化，可以和读者进行交互】-------》javascript

总之：html决定了网页是什么，css决定了网页是什么样式，javascript决定了网页能做什么

其中，前期html可以同时承担结构和表现的双重任务

一个网站从无到有的过程：

客户/产品经理提出来的需求-------》设计师进行设计-----》设计师和程序员合作完成------》测试人员----》程序员发布

二、html简介

1.概念

html，HyperText Markup Language,超文本标记语言

超文本：超出文本的范围

标记：html中所有的操作都是通过标记【标签】实现的

html1 ~ html5:是最基础的网页语言，是解释型和编译型的语言

2.第一个html程序

注意：

a.文件格式为xx.html或者xxx.htm

b.这是第一个html程序,其中，font被称为标签，size和color被称为属性

代码演示：

 
​x
<html>
    <head>
        
        <title>
            网页标题
        </title>
    </head>
        
    <body>
        这是<FONT size="5" color="red">第一个html程序</FONT>
        <br/>
        和Python&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;的区别
    </body> 
​
</html>

3.html的书写规范

a.一个html文件包含一个开始标签和结束标签：

b.html标签中包含两部分内容：

​ :用来设置html页面的属性和配置信息

​ :显示在网页中的内容

c.在head标签中包含两部分内容

​ </tilte>:设置网页标题</p><p>​ <meta charset="utf-8">:设置网页的编码格式</p><p>d.html中的标签分为两种：一类开始标签和结束标签，另外一类只有开始标签或者只有结束标签</p><p>e.html中的标签不区分大小写</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">a.父子关系：直接的包含关系</span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">b.兄弟关系：拥有同一个父标签的标签【平级】</span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">c.先辈后辈关系：隔代关系，父子关系</span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span class="cm-comment">--></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 577px;"></div></div></div></pre><p>html文件的命名规则：</p><p>​ a.可以由数字，字母，下划线，$</p><p>​ b.不能以数字开头，不要出现空格</p><p>​ c.大驼峰命名法</p></blockquote><h4><a name='header-c91' class='md-header-anchor '></a>4.html的操作思想</h4><blockquote><p>封装：一个标签就相当于是一个容器，想要修改容器内数据的样式，只需要修改容器属性的值，就可以实现修改内部数据的样式</p></blockquote><h3><a name='header-c95' class='md-header-anchor '></a>三、html常用的标签</h3><h4><a name='header-c96' class='md-header-anchor '></a>1.文字标签和段落标签</h4><h5><a name='header-c97' class='md-header-anchor '></a>1.1文字标签</h5><blockquote><p><font></font></p><p>属性：</p><p>​ size：文字的大小，取值范围为1~7，数值超过7之后仍然是7的大小</p><p>​ color:文字的颜色，有两种方式表示</p><p>​ 方式一：英文单词【red,green....】</p><p>​ 方式二:采用十六进制表示</p><p>​ 举例：#123456，每两位表示一种颜色，分别表示三原色，是RGB</p><p>​ 其中：#000000黑色 #FFFFFF白色</p><p>​ 方式三：rgb(r,g,b) rgba() 参数的取值范围为0~255</p><p>​ a----》alpha:透明度，取值范围为0~1</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 255px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h5><a name='header-c122' class='md-header-anchor '></a>1.2段落标签</h5><blockquote><p><p></p></p><p>注意：</p><p>​ a.不同的p标签之间默认可以换行</p><p>​ b.在同一个p的内部，多条数据之间可以换行</p><p>​ c.如果要设置段落中文字的样式，借助于font标签</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">font</span> <span class="cm-attribute">size</span>=<span class="cm-string">"5"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">color</span>=<span class="cm-string">"green"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>贾乃亮<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">font</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>与李小璐是在某个饭局上认识，随后他就对女方一见钟情，锲而不舍展开疯狂追求。李小璐曾在某访谈节目中透露，当时贾乃亮为了追求自己，还特别去打了一串与自己一样的耳洞，而且感染化脓，就只是为了引起她的注意，还有一次是李小璐发烧生病，贾乃亮衣不解带的守在身边照顾了5天5夜，连头都来不及洗，就是一直陪在自己身边。但是这也没让李小璐接受对方的追求，直到快1年了，有一次她看到贾乃亮喝醉，在自己面前委屈痛哭，才惊觉对方是对自己是认真的，才点头同意交往</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 509px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h5><a name='header-c137' class='md-header-anchor '></a>1.3和字体有关的其他标签【了解】</h5><blockquote><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div '></a>2.标题标签</h4><blockquote><p><hn></hn></p><p>n的取值范围：1~6</p><p>说明：数字越大，则表示的标题的字号越小</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner '></a>3.水平线标签、换行标签和特殊字符</h4><h5><a name='header-c154' class='md-header-anchor '></a>3.1水平线标签和换行标签</h5><blockquote><p><hr /></p><p>​ size:水平线的高度 color:水平线的颜色</p><p><br /></p><p>代码演示：</p><pre name='header-c165' class='md-header-anchor '></a>3.2特殊字符</h5><blockquote><pre class='md-fences mock-cm' style='display:block;position:relative'>" 双引号 & &符号 © 版权 ® 注册商标</pre><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"><!--<html>是网页的开始--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>html<span class="cm-atom">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>hello</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>3<span class="cm-atom">&times;</span>2 = 6</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>6<span class="cm-atom">&divide;</span>2 = 3</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 418px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h4><a name='header-c171' class='md-header-anchor '></a>4.图像标签</h4><h5><a name='header-c172' class='md-header-anchor '></a>4.1图像标签的使用</h5><blockquote><p><img /></p><p>属性：</p><p>​ src:图片的路径</p><p>​ 网络资源：直接赋值网址即可</p><p>​ 本地资源；图片的本地路径【绝对路径和相对路径】</p><p>​ width：图片显示的宽度</p><p>​ height：图片显示的高度</p><p>​ 单位：px【像素】 <br/></p><p>​ 百分比 ：50%</p><p>​ alt:图片上的文字提示【如果图片路径不存在，显示该文本】</p><p>​ title：鼠标悬浮标题，注意和alt之间的区别</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 4px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-hscrollbar" style="left: 0px;"><div style="height: 100%; min-height: 1px; width: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-vscrollbar"><div style="min-width: 1px; height: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 0px; min-height: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines"><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-meta"><!DOCTYPE html></span></span></pre></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">meta</span> <span class="cm-attribute">charset</span>=<span class="cm-string">"UTF-8"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--直接加载图片，如果设置大小，则默认显示的是图片本身的大小--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--加载本地图片--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"img/背景1.jpg"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">width</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">height</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100px"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--加载网络图片--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"http://www.baidu.com/img/bd_logo1.png"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--width和height的使用--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"img/背景1.jpg"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">width</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">height</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100px"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--</span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">图片的比例 a:b = w:h</span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">设置了w </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">h = w * b / a</span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">br</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--按照比例缩放，参照比例是浏览的宽和高的比例--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"img/背景1.jpg"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">width</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100%"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">height</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100%"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">br</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--alt的使用--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"img/背景.jpg"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">width</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">height</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">alt</span>=<span class="cm-string">"图片未记载"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">br</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--title的使用--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"img/背景1.jpg"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">width</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">height</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">title</span>=<span class="cm-string">"桌面壁纸"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 791px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h5><a name='header-c199' class='md-header-anchor '></a>4.2相对路径和绝对路径</h5><blockquote><p>相对路径：表示一个文件相对于另外一个文件的位置，重点在于找到一个参照物</p><p>绝对路径：</p><p>​ 当前html文件和图片文件路径之间的关系</p><p>​ a.在同一级目录下</p><p>​ b.html文件和图片的上一级目录在同一级目录下</p><p>​ c.图片和html文件的上一级目录在同一级目录下</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 4px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-hscrollbar" style="left: 0px;"><div style="height: 100%; min-height: 1px; width: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-vscrollbar"><div style="min-width: 1px; height: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 0px; min-height: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines"><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-meta"><!DOCTYPE html></span></span></pre></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">meta</span> <span class="cm-attribute">charset</span>=<span class="cm-string">"UTF-8"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--相对路径--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--形式一:html文件和图片是平级--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"背景1.jpg"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--形式二：html文件和图片的上一级目录在同一级目录下--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"img/背景1.jpg"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;">     </span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--形式三：../代表上一级目录，如果有多级目录：../../../--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"../背景1.jpg"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--</span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">src="../img/背景1.jpg"</span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment">--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 488px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h4><a name='header-c216' class='md-header-anchor '></a>5.块标签</h4><blockquote><p><pre></pre>：其中的内容按照原样输出</p><p><div></div>:会自动换行，在css中使用，主要用于分模块布局</p><p><span></span>:不会自动换行【注册用户时错误后面的提示】</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 4px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-hscrollbar" style="left: 0px;"><div style="height: 100%; min-height: 1px; width: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-vscrollbar"><div style="min-width: 1px; height: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 0px; min-height: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines"><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-meta"><!DOCTYPE html></span></span></pre></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">meta</span> <span class="cm-attribute">charset</span>=<span class="cm-string">"UTF-8"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>def text():</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>pass</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--可以将其中的数据按照原样输出--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">pre</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>def text():</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>pass</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">pre</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">div</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>562745<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">div</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">div</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>562745<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">div</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">div</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>562745<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">div</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre 698px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h4><a name='header-c227' class='md-header-anchor '></a>6.列表标签</h4><h5><a name='header-c228' class='md-header-anchor '></a>6.1自定义列表/解释型列表</h5><blockquote><p><dl></dl>:表示列表的范围，角色为父标签</p><p>​ <dt></dt>:上层内容，角色为子标签</p><p>​ <dd></dd>:下层内容，角色为子标签</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 417px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h4><a name='header-c257' class='md-header-anchor '></a>7.表格标签</h4><blockquote><p>可以对数据进行格式化，使得数据的显示更加条理化</p><p><table></table>:表示表格的范围，角色是父标签</p><p>​ <tr></tr>:表示行，角色是子标签</p><p>​ <td></td>:表示列【单元格】，角色：是tr的子标签</p><p><caption></caption>:设置表格的标题</p><p>属性：</p><p>​ border:表格边框的线条宽度</p><p>​ bordercolor:边框的颜色</p><p>​ cellspacing:单元格之间的间隔</p><p>​ width:表格或者单元格的宽度</p><p>​ height:表格或者单元格的高度</p><p>​ align:对齐方式，取值为left，center，right，默认向左对齐</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 4px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-hscrollbar" style="left: 0px;"><div style="height: 100%; min-height: 1px; width: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-vscrollbar"><div style="min-width: 1px; height: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 0px; min-height: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines"><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-meta"><!DOCTYPE html></span></span></pre></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">meta</span> <span class="cm-attribute">charset</span>=<span class="cm-string">"UTF-8"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag class="cm-comment"><!--需求：实现一个四行三列的表格--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag class="cm-string">"blue"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">cellspacing</span>=<span class="cm-string">"3px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">width</span>=<span class="cm-string">"300px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">height</span>=<span class="cm-string">"500px"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span> <span class="cm-attribute">align</span>=<span class="cm-string">"center"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>姓名<span class="cm-tag class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span> <span class="cm-attribute">align</span>=<span class="cm-string">"right"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>张三<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>18<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>李四<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--注意：th和td之间的区别：默认居中显示，加粗字体--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">th</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>王麻子<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">th</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>10<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">table</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 1956px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h2><a name='header-c286' class='md-header-anchor '></a>DAY02</h2><h3><a name='header-c287' class='md-header-anchor '></a>一、上堂回顾</h3><blockquote><p>1.网页开发的基础知识</p><p>​ 组成：结构，表现，行为</p><p>​ html，css，javascript</p><p>2.html简介</p><p>​ 规范：</p><p>​ 操作思想：封装 3.html中常用的标签</p><p>​ font：设置字体，size，color</p><p>​ p：段落</p><p>​ h标签：标题</p><p>​ hr :size，color</p><p>​ br:换行</p><p>​ 特殊字符【字符实体】： </p><p>​ img:src,width,height,alt,title</p><p>​ 相对路径的使用：../</p><p>​ 块标签：pre div span</p><p>​ 列表标签：有序【ol】，无序【ul】 li</p><p>​ 表格：table tr td</p><p>​ colspan,rowspan</p></blockquote><h3><a name='header-c326' class='md-header-anchor '></a>二、html中的常用标签</h3><h4><a name='header-c327' class='md-header-anchor '></a>8.超链接标签</h4><h5><a name='header-c328' class='md-header-anchor '></a>8.1简单使用</h5><blockquote><p><a></a></p><p>属性：</p><p>​ href：表示需要链接到的资源路径</p><p>​ 本地资源：注意相对路径</p><p>​ 网络资源：直接加载</p><p>​ target：设置打开的方式，默认在当前窗口中打开</p><p>​ _blank:在一个新的窗口打开</p><p>​ _self:在当前窗口打开</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 4px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-hscrollbar" style="left: 0px;"><div style="height: 100%; min-height: 1px; width: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-vscrollbar"><div style="min-width: 1px; height: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 0px; min-height: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines"><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-meta"><!DOCTYPE html></span></span></pre></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">meta</span> <span class="cm-attribute">charset</span>=<span class="cm-string">"utf-8"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--超链接的作用：通过点击，然后 进行跳转到指定资源--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--1.链接本地地址--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--target默认为为_self--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span> <span class="cm-attribute">href</span>=<span class="cm-string">"text.html"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>我是一个超链接<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span> <span class="cm-attribute">href</span>=<span class="cm-string">"text.html"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">target</span>=<span class="cm-string">"_self"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>我是一个超链接~~~~<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--_blank表示新打开一个窗口，返回按钮消失--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span> <span class="cm-attribute">href</span>=<span class="cm-string">"text.html"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">target</span>=<span class="cm-string">"_blank"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>我是一个超链接111<span class="cm-tag class="cm-comment"><!--2.相对路径--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag class="cm-comment"><!--3.链接网络地址--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span> <span class="cm-attribute">href</span>=<span class="cm-string">"http://www.baidu.com"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>百度一下<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--4.让图片有超链接的效果--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">img</span> <span class="cm-attribute">src</span>=<span class="cm-string">"img/背景1.jpg"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">width</span>=<span class="cm-string">"50px"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">height</span>=<span class="cm-string">"50px"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--5.让超链接没有点击效果--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--如果超链接不需要连接到任何地方，设置一个占位符#--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 839px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h5><a name='header-c349' class='md-header-anchor '></a>8.2定位资源</h5><blockquote><p>1>回到顶部</p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 4px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-hscrollbar" style="left: 0px;"><div style="height: 100%; min-height: 1px; width: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-vscrollbar"><div style="min-width: 1px; height: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 0px; min-height: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines"><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-meta"><!DOCTYPE html></span></span></pre></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">meta</span> <span class="cm-attribute">charset</span>=<span class="cm-string">"UTF-8"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>超链接的定位资源<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--回到顶部--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>据台湾媒体报道，演员贾乃亮近日深陷婚变风波，老婆李小璐被拍到与饶舌歌手勾手、共度一夜的画面，他6日发出长文回应此事，内容却被网友解读为是在默认“被戴绿帽”，事情越演越烈，两人过去在录节目的互动，以及放闪画面也一一被翻出，网友发现其实贾乃亮真的非常爱李小璐，向对方求了3次婚，而且还会为对方下厨等。</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;">   贾乃亮与李小璐是在某个饭局上认识，随后他就对女方一见钟情，锲而不舍展开疯狂追求。李小璐曾在某访谈节目中透露，当时贾乃亮为了追求自己，还特别去打了一串与自己一样的耳洞，而且感染化脓，就只是为了引起她的注意，还有一次是李小璐发烧生病，贾乃亮衣不解带的守在身边照顾了5天5夜，连头都来不及洗，就是一直陪在自己身边。但是这也没让李小璐接受对方的追求，直到快1年了，有一次她看到贾乃亮喝醉，在自己面前委屈痛哭，才惊觉对方是对自己是认真的，才点头同意交往。</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--回到顶部--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>据台湾媒体报道，演员贾乃亮近日深陷婚变风波，老婆李小璐被拍到与饶舌歌手勾手、共度一夜的画面，他6日发出长文回应此事，内容却被网友解读为是在默认“被戴绿帽”，事情越演越烈，两人过去在录节目的互动，以及放闪画面也一一被翻出，网友发现其实贾乃亮真的非常爱李小璐，向对方求了3次婚，而且还会为对方下厨等。</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;">   贾乃亮与李小璐是在某个饭局上认识，随后他就对女方一见钟情，锲而不舍展开疯狂追求。李小璐曾在某访谈节目中透露，当时贾乃亮为了追求自己，还特别去打了一串与自己一样的耳洞，而且感染化脓，就只是为了引起她的注意，还有一次是李小璐发烧生病，贾乃亮衣不解带的守在身边照顾了5天5夜，连头都来不及洗，就是一直陪在自己身边。但是这也没让李小璐接受对方的追求，直到快1年了，有一次她看到贾乃亮喝醉，在自己面前委屈痛哭，才惊觉对方是对自己是认真的，才点头同意交往。</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--回到顶部--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>据台湾媒体报道，演员贾乃亮近日深陷婚变风波，老婆李小璐被拍到与饶舌歌手勾手、共度一夜的画面，他6日发出长文回应此事，内容却被网友解读为是在默认“被戴绿帽”，事情越演越烈，两人过去在录节目的互动，以及放闪画面也一一被翻出，网友发现其实贾乃亮真的非常爱李小璐，向对方求了3次婚，而且还会为对方下厨等。</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;">   贾乃亮与李小璐是在某个饭局上认识，随后他就对女方一见钟情，锲而不舍展开疯狂追求。李小璐曾在某访谈节目中透露，当时贾乃亮为了追求自己，还特别去打了一串与自己一样的耳洞，而且感染化脓，就只是为了引起她的注意，还有一次是李小璐发烧生病，贾乃亮衣不解带的守在身边照顾了5天5夜，连头都来不及洗，就是一直陪在自己身边。但是这也没让李小璐接受对方的追求，直到快1年了，有一次她看到贾乃亮喝醉，在自己面前委屈痛哭，才惊觉对方是对自己是认真的，才点头同意交往。</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--回到顶部--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>据台湾媒体报道，演员贾乃亮近日深陷婚变风波，老婆李小璐被拍到与饶舌歌手勾手、共度一夜的画面，他6日发出长文回应此事，内容却被网友解读为是在默认“被戴绿帽”，事情越演越烈，两人过去在录节目的互动，以及放闪画面也一一被翻出，网友发现其实贾乃亮真的非常爱李小璐，向对方求了3次婚，而且还会为对方下厨等。</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;">   贾乃亮与李小璐是在某个饭局上认识，随后他就对女方一见钟情，锲而不舍展开疯狂追求。李小璐曾在某访谈节目中透露，当时贾乃亮为了追求自己，还特别去打了一串与自己一样的耳洞，而且感染化脓，就只是为了引起她的注意，还有一次是李小璐发烧生病，贾乃亮衣不解带的守在身边照顾了5天5夜，连头都来不及洗，就是一直陪在自己身边。但是这也没让李小璐接受对方的追求，直到快1年了，有一次她看到贾乃亮喝醉，在自己面前委屈痛哭，才惊觉对方是对自己是认真的，才点头同意交往。</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">p</span><span class="cm-tag </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span> <span class="cm-attribute">href</span>=<span class="cm-string">"#top"</span><span cm-bracket">></span>第三段<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span> <span class="cm-attribute">href</span>=<span class="cm-string">"pageInfo.html#p4"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>第四段<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">a</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 301px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h4><a name='header-c364' class='md-header-anchor '></a>9.音视频标签</h4><h5><a name='header-c365' class='md-header-anchor '></a>9.1音频</h5><blockquote><p>html5新增，可以加载mp3,wav</p><p><audio></audio></p><p>属性：</p><p>​ src：设置需要加载的音频的资源路径</p><p>​ autoplay:自动加载</p><p>​ controls:显示进度条</p><p>​ loop：循环播放</p></blockquote><h5><a name='header-c381' class='md-header-anchor '></a>9.2视频</h5><blockquote><p><video></video></p><p>可以加载mp4,wav等</p><p>属性：</p><p>​ src：设置需要加载的音频的资源路径</p><p>​ autoplay:自动加载</p><p>​ controls:显示进度条</p><p>​ loop：循环播放</p></blockquote><h4><a name='header-c397' class='md-header-anchor '></a>10.表单标签【重点】</h4><blockquote><p>作用：可以提交不同类型的数据到指定服务器</p><p>标签：</p><p>​ <form></form>:表示表单的范围【父标签】</p><p>​ 这个标签主要是用于采集用户信息,分为：表单标签、表单域、表单按钮 </p><p>​ 属性：</p><p>​ action：提交的位置</p><p>​ method：提交的方式【get，post】</p><p>​ enctype:很少用，做文件提交的时候使用</p><p>​ 子标签：</p><p>​ <input />:表示输入项【子标签】</p><p>​ 普通输入项：type="text"</p><p>​ 密码输入项：type="password"</p><p>​ 单项输入项：type="radio"</p><p>​ 多项输入项：type="checkbox"</p><p>​ 文件输入项：type="file"</p><p>​ 邮件输入项：type="email"</p><p>​ 颜色输入项：type="color"</p><p>​ 日期输入项：type="date"</p><p>​ 进度条输入项：type="range"</p><p>​ 提交按钮：type="submit"</p><p>​ 重置按钮：type="reset"</p><p>​ <select></select>:下拉菜单</p><p>​ <option></option>:下拉菜单中的选项</p><p>​ <textarea></textarea>:文本域【可以输入多行】</p><p>初始状态</p><p><a href='http://127.0.0.1:8020/Day2Code/text.html' target='_blank' >http://127.0.0.1:8020/Day2Code/text.html</a></p><p>添加name属性</p><p><a href='http://127.0.0.1:8020/Day2Code/text.html?phoneNum=525266&username=sbhs&pwd=bsnbs&sex=on&hobby=on&hobby=on&headImage=&birth=1990&des=bsefhrtjnety' target='_blank' >http://127.0.0.1:8020/Day2Code/text.html?phoneNum=525266&username=sbhs&pwd=bsnbs&sex=on&hobby=on&hobby=on&headImage=&birth=1990&des=bsefhrtjnety</a></p><p>添加value属性</p><p><a href='http://127.0.0.1:8020/Day2Code/text.html?phoneNum=6374&username=twerg&pwd=gwer&sex=female&hobby=l&hobby=p&headImage=&birth=1989&des=hthrtj' target='_blank' >http://127.0.0.1:8020/Day2Code/text.html?phoneNum=6374&username=twerg&pwd=gwer&sex=female&hobby=l&hobby=p&headImage=&birth=1989&des=hthrtj</a></p><p>代码演示：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 4px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-hscrollbar" style="left: 0px;"><div style="height: 100%; min-height: 1px; width: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-vscrollbar"><div style="min-width: 1px; height: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 0px; min-height: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines"><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-meta"><!DOCTYPE html></span></span></pre></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag class="cm-tag">meta</span> <span class="cm-attribute">charset</span>=<span class="cm-string">"UTF-8"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--在表单标签中，每个标签都有value【值】，name【提交给服务器，方便服务器进行区分是哪种数据】属性--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--placeholder：未输入之前的提示文本，不影响正常的输入--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">form</span> <span class="cm-attribute">action</span>=<span class="cm-string">"text.html"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">method</span>=<span class="cm-string">"get"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--普通输入项--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> class="cm-comment"><!--邮箱--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--placeholder：提示--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>邮箱：<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span class="cm-string">"email"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">placeholder</span>=<span class="cm-string">"请输入邮箱"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>颜色：<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span class="cm-string">"color"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>日期：<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span class="cm-string">"date"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">br</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>进度条：<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span class="cm-string">"range"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">min</span>=<span class="cm-string">"0"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">max</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">value</span>=<span class="cm-string">"10"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span>隐藏域：<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span class="cm-string">"hidden"</span> <span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--按钮--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--value：设置按钮上的文字--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--普通按钮，没有任何功能--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span class="cm-string">"button"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">value</span>=<span class="cm-string">"点击"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--重置按钮：将整个表单的内容恢复到初始状态--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span class="cm-string">"reset"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">value</span>=<span class="cm-string">"reset"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-comment"><!--提交按钮：将整个表单的内容提交到指定服务器--></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span class="cm-string">"submit"</span> <span class="cm-attribute">value</span>=<span class="cm-string">"submit"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">/></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">form</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 1514px;"></div></div></div></pre><p>两种提交方式之间的区别【面试题】</p><p>​ a.get提交数据地址栏中会出现所有的数据，post不会携带【请求体】</p><p>​ b.get请求安全级别较低，post相对较高</p><p>​ c.get请求传输数据的效率较高，post相对较低</p><p>​ d.get请求对数据的大小有限制，但是post没有</p><p>练习：</p><pre class="md-fences md-end-block" lang="html"> <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 0px; left: 4px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-hscrollbar" style="left: 0px;"><div style="height: 100%; min-height: 1px; width: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-vscrollbar"><div style="min-width: 1px; height: 0px;"></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 0px; min-height: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines"><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-meta"><!DOCTYPE html></span></span></pre></div><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">meta</span> <span class="cm-attribute">charset</span>=<span class="cm-string">"UTF-8"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">title</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">head</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">h3</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>还没有千锋教育账号？<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">h3</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">form</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">table</span> <span class="cm-attribute">width</span>=<span class="cm-string">"100%"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span> <span class="cm-attribute">align</span>=<span class="cm-string">"right"</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>电子邮箱<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">input</span> <span class="cm-attribute">type</span>=<span </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span><span class="cm-atom">&nbsp;</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag">option</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">select</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span>日</span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">td</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"><</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></</span><span class="cm-tag">tr</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">table</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">form</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tab"> </span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">body</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre><pre class=""><span style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket"></</span><span class="cm-tag">html</span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 30px; width: 1px; top: 0px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="display: none; height: 1351px;"></div></div></div></pre></blockquote><h4><a name='header-c475' class='md-header-anchor '></a>11.头标签</h4><blockquote><p>头标签：head</p><p><title>:设置网页的标题

:设置超链接的基本位置，可以统一打开的方式

:设置当前页面的一些信息

​ charset：字符集【编码格式】

​ name：关键字

​ content：内容

:在css中用于引入外部css文件

代码演示：

 
xxxxxxxxxx
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        
        <title>网页的标题</title>
        
        <!--早期的搜索引擎，通过指定的关键字进行搜索-->
        <meta charset="utf-8" name="keywords" content="千锋,it" />
        
        <!--当前页面经过3秒之后跳转到url指定的页面-->
        <!--<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="3;url=http://www.baidu.com"/>-->
        
        <!--设置当前页面中所有的超链接都按照指定的方式打开页面-->
        <base target="_blank" />
        
        <!--<link  />-->
        
    </head>
    <body>
        <a href="text.html">超链接一</a>
        <a>超链接二</a>
        <a>超链接三</a>
        
    </body>
</html>

12.框架标签【了解】

:划分规则【父标签】

​ rows:按照行进行划分

​ cols:按照列进行划分

​ ：具体显示的页面【子标签】

注意：不能写在body中，不能写在body外面，使用了框架标签之后，则需要将body去掉

代码演示：

 
xxxxxxxxxx
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title></title>
    </head>
    
    <!--列分：cols-->
    <!--<frameset cols="30%,50%,20%">
        <frame src="1.超链接标签的使用一.html"/>
        <frame src="4.音视频标签的使用.html"/>
        <frame src="6.表单标签的使用二【了解】.html"/>
    </frameset>-->
    
    <!--行分-->
    <!--<frameset rows="30%,50%,20%">
        <frame src="1.超链接标签的使用一.html"/>
        <frame src="4.音视频标签的使用.html"/>
        <frame src="6.表单标签的使用二【了解】.html"/>
    </frameset>-->
    
    <!--混合分-->
    <frameset rows="20%,*">
        <frame src="1.超链接标签的使用一.html" />
        <frameset cols="40%,*">
            <frame src="4.音视频标签的使用.html"/>
            <frame src="6.表单标签的使用二【了解】.html"/>
        </frameset>
    </frameset>
</html>

三、CSS标准

引入案例：

 
xxxxxxxxxx
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title></title>
        <style>
            h2{
                color: red;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body>
        <!--<h2>
            <font color="red">标题一</font>
        </h2>
        <p>段落一</p>
        
        <h2>
            <font color="red">标题二</font>
        </h2>
        <p>段落二</p>
        
        <h2>
            <font color="blue">标题二</font>
        </h2>
        <p>段落三</p>
